title: Bugfixes to discovery pages, cloning routes. Updated Temple of the Jade Serpent mapping

changes.change: Improved the graphics for most of the Dragonflight Season 1 dungeons, and added new backgrounds.
Updated MDT version - Temple of the Jade Serpent now has the missing enemies at the last boss.

"A new mapping version is available for your route" is no longer shown when you're not actively editing the route. A new warning in the header is shown instead to alert you you may be viewing an outdated route.
Routes that have multiple affixes assigned to them no longer show up more than once in the route discovery pages.
Halls of Valor and Court of Stars no longer think they are part of Legion Timewalking in the route discovery pages.
Route thumbnails are now no longer rendered blank.
Cloning a route no longer clones the route with empty pulls.
Creating a new pull using shift + click will now always add the pull in the correct position in the route.
